titles.title: Computer-Assisted Remote Hunting Act
Computer-Assisted Remote Hunting Act
A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit certain computer-assisted remote hunting, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Computer-Assisted Remote Hunting Act - Amends the federal criminal code to prohibit and to establish penalties for knowingly making available a computer-assisted remote hunt (i.e., using a computer or other device, equipment, or software to allow a person remotely to control the aiming and discharge of a weapon to kill or injure an animal while not in the physical presence of the weapon).
